H3.text: what kind of language does turkey speak. Turkish Language

A4.text: Turkish is the national language of Turkey and one of two official languages of Cyprus.

A5.text: In 2005, 93% of the population of Turkey were native speakers of Turkish, about 67 million at the time, with Kurdish languages making up most of the remainder.
